    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Admin
    Admin
    AdminDAO
    AdminDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) class for retrieving and managing data related to players, teams, matches, events, and performance in the Soccer Management System.
    AdminFrame
    AdminFrame
    BackupRestore
     
    DatabaseInitializer
    DatabaseInitializer
    DBConnection
    DBConnection is a utility class for managing a single SQLite database connection.
    EditEventFrame
    EditEventFrame provides the GUI for managing Game Events in the Soccer Management System.
    EditMatchFrame
    EditMatchFrame provides the GUI for managing Matches in the Soccer Management System.
    EditPerformanceFrame
    EditPerformanceFrame provides GUI for managing player performance.
    EditPlayerFrame
    EditPlayerFrame provides the GUI for managing Players in the Soccer Management System.
    EditTeamFrame
    EditTeamFrame provides a GUI interface to manage Teams in the Soccer Management System.
    EmailService
    EmailService
    ForgotPassFrame
    ForgotPassFrame provides a GUI interface for users to reset their password.
    GameEvent
    GameEvent
    GameEventDAO
    GameEventDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) class responsible for performing CRUD operations (Create, Update, Delete) on the `game_event` table in the Soccer Management System database.
    LoginFrame
    LoginFrame provides a graphical interface for users to log in to the Soccer Matches System.
    Main
     
    Match
    Match
    MatchDAO
    MatchDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) class responsible for performing CRUD operations (Create, Update, Delete) on the `matches` table in the Soccer Management System database.
    Performance
    Performance
    PerformanceDAO
    PerformanceDAO
    Player
    Player
    PlayerDAO
    PlayerDAO
    SignupFrame
    SignupFrame provides a graphical interface for creating a new user account in the Soccer Matches System.
    Team
    Team
    TeamDAO
    TeamDAO
    User
    User
    UserDAO
    UserDAO
    Viewer
    Viewer
    ViewerFrame
    ViewerFrame provides the graphical interface for "Viewer" users in the Soccer Matches System.
